doc: The port to bind the application to.
Access token to the GitHub account being used to push files with.
URL of an Akismet account used for spam checking.
API key to be used with Akismet.
RSA private key to encrypt sensitive configuration parameters with.
docExample: rsaPrivateKey: "-----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----\nkey\n-----END RSA PRIVATE KEY-----"

doc: Mailgun API key to be used for email notifications. Will be overridden by a `notifications.apiKey` parameter in the site config, if one is set.
Domain to be used with Mailgun for email notifications. Will be overridden by a `notifications.domain` parameter in the site config, if one is set.
Email address to send notifications from. Will be overridden by a `notifications.fromAddress` parameter in the site config, if one is set.
